Title: Spice Paradise: Curry Meshi Ver.
Description: ["Nissin Foods' Curry Meshi instant curry rice brand opened an official website for the newest wave of its collaboration with The IDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls on Thursday. Positive Passion idols Mio Honda, Aiko Takamori, and Akane Hino perform the new song ", Spice Paradise ~Curry Meshi ver.~, " with the instant curry rice brand's mascot Curry Meshi-kun. The girls sing the praises of Curry Meshi while delivering a catchy song and dance number. ", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN)']
Related: ['Other: The iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls: Anytime, Anywhere with Cinderella.']
